definition[0]: to make something have a sharper edge or point, or to become sharper
example[0]: Anne sharpened her pencil and got out her homework.
definition[1]: to make a feeling stronger and more urgent
example[1]: A series of attacks have sharpened fears of more violence.
definition[2]: to improve something so that it is up to the necessary standard, quality etc
example[2]: The course will help students sharpen their writing skills.
